name: The Orion Suns
description:
How beautiful the night sky is, how many secrets hides the shroud of cosmic void.
Anna the researcher needs your help. You need to create constellations in different orders to make a map of the night sky. The task is not for a weak spirit, but quite feasible, besides Anna will provide you all possible assistance.
The mechanics of the game is an uncomplicated puzzle: while connecting the constellations in the correct order and fulfilling a number of different conditions, you go from level to level. The tasks progressively become more complicated, and the constellations become more intricate. It will not be hard for the fans of this genre to complete the game, and it will not take much time.
So, everything is in your hands.
